      • loadSprite

        public Sprite loadSprite(java.lang.String resource)
        Overloads the default sprite loading, ignoring the exception. This class assumes all sprites are provided, hence the exception will be thrown as a RuntimeException.

        Loads a sprite from a resource on the class path. Sprites are loaded once, and then stored in the store so that they can be efficiently retrieved.

        Overrides:
        loadSprite in class SpriteStore
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource path.
        Returns:
        The sprite for the resource.
